ai-tha-ap267:1.4_0: were fully developed, said in the sāl tree grove.
ai-tha-ap267:2.4_0: if they sleep like a sage should beamed;
ai-tha-ap267:3.1_0: my nurse used to be yours,
ai-tha-ap267:4.1_0: if he makes his four eons;
ai-tha-ap267:4.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap267:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Bāliya.
ai-tha-ap267:7.1_0: The fifth section for recitation on the Elder Bāliyan (Discourse)
